Indications/Uses: REACTINE<sup>®</sup> (cetirizine hydrochloride) is indicated for fast relief of nasal and non-nasal seasonal (e.g. trees, grass, pollen, ragweed/hay fever) and year-round (e.g. dust, animal dander, mold) allergy symptoms, including: sneezing, runny nose, and post-nasal discharge; nasal congestion/stuffiness; itchy, watery eyes; itchy nose/throat; and itching and hives due to allergic skin reactions.
Warning and Precautions: If you are pregnant or nursing a baby or have liver or kidney disease, consult your doctor before use. Keep out of reach of children. Consult patient information insert before use. Product monograph available to health professionals upon request.  Do not exceed recommended dosage. Prolonged use only as directed by a doctor. Do not use if sealed blister shows signs of tampering. Store between 15-30°C.
Directions/Usage Instructions: Adults and children 12 years of age and over: Take one tablet every 24 hours, anytime of day. Adults 65 years of age and over: Use REACTINE<sup>®</sup> Regular Strength (5 mg) Tablets  or consult a doctor.

This non-drowsy formula helps relieve sneezing; stuffiness; itchy, watery eyes; hives; runny nose; itchy nose and throat; nasal congestion; and allergic skin itch. Adults and children 12 years of age and over should take one tablet every 24 hours, anytime of day. Ingredients: Medicinal Ingredients (per caplet): Acetaminophen (extra strength) 500 mg, diphenhydramine hydrochloride 25mg. Non-Medicinal Ingredients: Carnauba wax, cellulose, FD&C Blue No. 1 aluminum lake, FD&C Blue No. 2 aluminum lake, hypromellose, magnesium stearate, polyethylene glycol, polysorbate, propylene glycol, shellac glaze, sodium citrate, sodium starch gylcolate, starch, titanium dioxide.
Indications/Uses: Extra Strength TYLENOL<sup>®</sup> Nighttime Caplets provide fast, effective relief of nighttime pain with accompanying sleeplessness due to back and body pain, headaches, muscle aches and pains, arthritis pain, menstrual pain, dental pain, and aches and pains due to colds and the flu. Improves the duration of your sleep.
Warning and Precautions:
Keep out of the reach of children. This package contains enough medication to seriously harm a child. May cause marked drowsiness. Avoid alcohol, driving, or other activities requiring alertness. Do not use with other drugs containing acetaminophen or diphenhydramine. Do not take more than the maximum daily dose. Overdose may result in severe or possibly fatal liver damage. Do not take if allergic to acetaminophen, diphenhydramine, or any ingredient in the product. Do not use with a topically applied product that also contains diphenhydramine. Consult a doctor if your symptoms last for more than five days, if new symptoms appear, or if you develop allergic reactions such as wheezing, rash, or itching. If sleeplessness persists continuously for more than two weeks, consult your doctor. Insomnia may be a symptom of serious underlying illness. Use only on the advice of a doctor. Ask a doctor or pharmacist before use if you: are taking tranquilizers or sedatives; are pregnant or breastfeeding; have chronic alcoholism; have a serious liver or kidney disease; have glaucoma, chronic lung disease (including asthma), difficulty in urination due to prostate gland enlargement; are elderly and experience confusion at night; use any other medications including natural health products, prescription drugs, salicylates or other pain and fever relief medications.
See insert for important information before use.
In case of overdose, call a Poison Control Centre or doctor immediately, even if you do not notice any possible signs or symptoms such as increased sweating, nausea, vomiting, stomach pain, and loss of appetite.

Do not use if carton is open or if printed bottle neck band or inner foil seal is broken.
CHILD RESISTANT PACKAGE
Store at room temperature 15–30°C (59–86°F).
Not a standard dosage unit product.
Directions/Usage Instructions: See insert for important information before use. Adult use only (16 years and older): take two caplets at bedtime, or as directed by a doctor. Do not take more than 2 caplets per day.

Do not take more than the maximum daily dose. Overdose may result in severe or possibly fatal liver damage. Consult a doctor if your symptoms last for more than five days, or fever lasts more than three days. Ask a doctor or pharmacist before use if you are pregnant or breastfeeding; have chronic alcoholism; have a serious liver or kidney disease; use any other medications, including natural health products, prescription drugs, salicylates, or other pain and fever relief medications.

Do not take if allergic to acetaminophen. Consult a doctor if you develop allergic reactions such as wheezing, rash, or itching. Use only on the advice of a doctor.

In case of overdose, call a Poison Control Centre or doctor immediately, even if you do not notice any possible signs or symptoms such as increased sweating, nausea, vomiting, stomach pain, and loss of appetite.

Not a standard dosage unit product.

Ingredients: Medicinal Ingredient: Cetirizine hydrochloride 10 mg/capsule. Non-Medicinal Ingredients: Gelatin, glycerin, lecithin, mannitol, medium chain triglycerides, pharmaceutical ink, polyethylene glycol 400, purified water, sodium hydroxide, sorbitan, sorbitol.
Indications/Uses: REACTINE<sup>®</sup> (cetirizine hydrochloride) is indicated for fast relief of nasal and non-nasal seasonal (e.g., trees, grass, pollen, and ragweed/hay fever) and year-round (e.g., dust, animal dander, and mold) allergy symptoms, including sneezing, runny nose, and post-nasal discharge; nasal congestion/stuffiness; itchy, watery eyes; itchy nose/throat; and itching and hives due to allergic skin reactions.
Warning and Precautions: If you are pregnant or nursing a baby or have liver or kidney disease, consult your doctor before use. Keep out of reach of children. Store between 15-30°C. Avoid high humidity and excessive heat (above 40°C). Protect from light. Consult patient information insert before use. Product Monograph available to health professionals upon request. Do not exceed recommended dosage. Do not use if tamper-evident seal under bottle cap is broken or missing.
Directions/Usage Instructions: Adults and children 12 years of age and over: Take one 10 mg capsule every 24 hours, any time of day. Adults 65 years of age and over: Use Regular Strength REACTINE<sup>®</sup> Tablets (5 mg) or consult a doctor. Do not exceed recommended dosage.

Ingredients: Medicinal Ingredients (each caplet contains): Acetaminophen 500 mg, dextromethorphan hydrobromide 15 mg, pseudoephedrine hydrochloride 30 mg, guaifenesin 100 mg. Non-Medicinal Ingredients: Cellulose, crospovidone, D&C Yellow #10 Aluminum Lake, FD&C Yellow #6 Aluminum Lake, hypromellose, polyethylene glycol, polysorbate, povidone, silica, starch, stearic acid, titanium dioxide, wax, zinc stearate.
Indications/Uses: Extra Strength TYLENOL<sup>®</sup> Complete Cold, Cough & Flu Caplets relieve nasal congestion, dry cough, headache, fever, sore throat pain, aches, pains, and chills. These caplets also thin and loosen mucus and relieve cough with phlegm.
Warning and Precautions:
Keep out of the reach of children. This package contains enough medication to seriously harm a child. Do not take more than the recommended dose. Overdose may cause nervousness, dizziness, sleeplessness, or severe or possibly fatal liver damage. Consult a doctor before use with other medications, including natural health products, prescription drugs, non-prescription drugs, or if you have chronic alcoholism, serious kidney or liver disease, high blood pressure, heart or thyroid disease, diabetes, chronic lung disease, shortness of breath, asthma, glaucoma, an enlarged prostate, or are elderly, pregnant, or breastfeeding. . Do not use with a monoamine oxidase inhibitor (MAOI, e.g. drug for depression) or for two weeks after stopping the MAOI. Persistent cough may be a sign of a serious condition. Use only on the advice of a doctor. Consult a doctor if fever lasts more than three days, sore throat pain lasts more than two days, or symptoms last more than five days. If symptoms worsen or are accompanied by a high fever (>38° C) or the production of thick, yellow/green phlegm, talk to a doctor. Do not take if allergic to any of the ingredients. Discontinue use if allergic reactions such as wheezing, rash, or itching develop.

Do not use if a blister unit is broken. Child-resistant package.
Store between 15 and 30° C. Protect from light. Keep dry.
In case of overdose: Contact a doctor or Poison Control Centre immediately, even if you do not notice any possible signs or symptoms such as increased sweating, nausea, vomiting, stomach pain, and loss of appetite.
Directions/Usage Instructions: Do not use with other products containing any of these ingredients, salicylates, or other cough/cold or pain/fever medications. Adult use only. Read the complete label before use and follow all directions. Adults/children (12 years and older): Take two caplets every six hours. Do not exceed eight caplets per day.
